title: Program/Project/AI Cass
body:
Hi! Im gonna try to sketch a skin concept for cass (til she get a skin then ill switch) everyday just to practice...

[img]http://i.imgur.com/6qN7TKL.jpg[/img]

replies.body:
TBH this would be boss af. Like no really why is this not a thing? I'd prefer it not be program--even though I love the program line cuz both my baby girls will have that skin (Liss and Camille) however, I'm disappointed with Program's particles compared to other robotic skins such as the Project line.  So if anything I'd rather it be called like Prototype or even Battlecast since she is Noxian and has evil intent similar to Urgot.

But yea no lovely skin I'd totally buy it.
